title: Bug: Root URL returns 404 and /api/docs shows blank page
description: Accessing http://localhost:3000 returns 404 error and http://localhost:3000/api/docs loads a blank page instead of Swagger documentation.
steps_to_reproduce: Start the application with npm run start:dev
expected_behavior: Root URL should redirect or show welcome message. /api/docs should display Swagger UI with API documentation.
actual_behavior: Root returns {statusCode:404, message:'Cannot GET /'}, /api/docs shows blank page
root_cause_hypothesis: Swagger setup may be incorrect or missing assets. Root path has no controller mapped.
acceptance_criteria: AC1: http://localhost:3000/api/docs displays Swagger UI correctly
AC2: Root URL returns helpful response (not 404)
AC3: All existing unit tests pass
